column4: in hardy open nautilus then edit>prefs>media but no easy way to change default apps to use

no. but here is an example of how to change video player to vlc.  its pretty stupid that they left out an easy way to do it but oh well         http://ohioloco.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=770970
